    • Uses of Position in gui

      Methods in gui with parameters of type Position 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GUI.lightensorError(Position position)
      shows if a sensor is facing a dark surface
      void GUI.lightSensorAlright(Position position)
      shows if the sensor is facing a light surface
